title: How to Rush a Mule in Diablo II (Hardcore)

steps.headline: Go straight down to the Level 4 catacombs.
steps.description: Once you are in level 4, kill everything before opening the double doors.

steps.headline: Open TP and bring the mule down, open the double doors and kill everything aside from Andy.
Wait for Andy or draw her near you.
steps.description: Kill quickly. The mule needs to be at least a screen level within death. You will know if you are successful when you get a level 4 portal.

steps.headline: Do Claw Viper Quest for Arcane wp (waypoint).
Go into a public game and just party with a group and hang out and get the Duriel quest; you are counting on them doing the quest.
steps.description: This is for just you solo.

steps.headline: Get the Staff of Kings, and the amulet.
steps.description: The mule needs to get the amulet, but it's not a problem. Your high level character will kill everything. TP and mule just comes in, open the casket and get the amulet and the quest. The mule will use the cube to merge the King of Staffs and the Claw Viper amulet to get the Horadric Staff. High level character goes to arcane.

steps.headline: Get near Summoner, Tp for mule.
steps.description: Make sure Summoner is near. This gets really tricky, but timing is important. It helps to kill everything except Summoner, bring in the mule and kill Summoner within screen level of mule.

steps.headline: Find the right tomb.
steps.description: Bring in the mule to open Duriel's cave. You can kill Duriel with the mule safely in town.

steps.headline: Make sure the mule talks to Tyreal first, because if you don't, it will say you can't complete quest.
steps.description: Talking to Tyreal makes the game think you were there when Duriel died.

steps.headline: Go to Trav (Travincial).
steps.description: Kill everything around the council area. This is very important, because just because the priests run from high level character. They will home in on the mule. So make sure everyone is dead. Don't kill council just yet.

steps.headline: Bring in the mule.
steps.description: You can also try to position your mule on the ledge behind the building the council is in.

steps.headline: Try to draw council to you, but protect the mule.
steps.description: You must kill all council within screen-shot of the mule or your mule will not get quest. Be careful of FE or Cold enhanced. Their death won't hurt you, but will take out your mule.

steps.headline: Give your mule Durance wp.
steps.description: Go to Durance level 3. Kill everything but Meph. Tp mule down. Your mule should be OK off to the side while you hack away at Mephisto; he doesn't last long. Mule should be about to take red portal to Act 4.

steps.headline: For Hellforge: kill everyone, tp mule down and your mule will get hammer off ground and smash soulstone.
For Diablo: kill everything.
steps.description: Try not to do all portals; if you do, no sweat, it's just easier to position your mule in a safe spot before you summon Diablo. There is a corner northwest of the pentagon that you can tuck the mule away in. And yes, the mule needs to be down there when you kill Diablo. Kill Diablo. The mule will take portal to act five.

text: Act I Go straight down to the Level 4 catacombs. Once you are in level 4, kill everything before opening the double doors. Open TP and bring the mule down, open the double doors and kill everything aside from Andy.  Wait for Andy or draw her near you. Kill quickly. The mule needs to be at least a screen level within death. You will know if you are successful when you get a level 4 portal. Take the mule to Act 2.  Act II Do Claw Viper Quest for Arcane wp (waypoint).  Go into a public game and just party with a group and hang out and get the Duriel quest; you are counting on them doing the quest. This is for just you solo. Get the Staff of Kings, and the amulet. The mule needs to get the amulet, but it's not a problem. Your high level character will kill everything. TP and mule just comes in, open the casket and get the amulet and the quest. The mule will use the cube to merge the King of Staffs and the Claw Viper amulet to get the Horadric Staff. High level character goes to arcane. Get near Summoner, Tp for mule. Make sure Summoner is near. This gets really tricky, but timing is important. It helps to kill everything except Summoner, bring in the mule and kill Summoner within screen level of mule. Find the right tomb. Bring in the mule to open Duriel's cave. You can kill Duriel with the mule safely in town. Make sure the mule talks to Tyreal first, because if you don't, it will say you can't complete quest. Talking to Tyreal makes the game think you were there when Duriel died. Act III Go to Trav (Travincial). Kill everything around the council area. This is very important, because just because the priests run from high level character. They will home in on the mule. So make sure everyone is dead. Don't kill council just yet. Bring in the mule. You can also try to position your mule on the ledge behind the building the council is in. Try to draw council to you, but protect the mule. You must kill all council within screen-shot of the mule or your mule will not get quest. Be careful of FE or Cold enhanced. Their death won't hurt you, but will take out your mule. Give your mule Durance wp. Go to Durance level 3. Kill everything but Meph. Tp mule down. Your mule should be OK off to the side while you hack away at Mephisto; he doesn't last long. Mule should be about to take red portal to Act 4. Act IV For Hellforge: kill everyone, tp mule down and your mule will get hammer off ground and smash soulstone.  For Diablo: kill everything. Try not to do all portals; if you do, no sweat, it's just easier to position your mule in a safe spot before you summon Diablo. There is a corner northwest of the pentagon that you can tuck the mule away in. And yes, the mule needs to be down there when you kill Diablo. Kill Diablo. The mule will take portal to act five.
